Michelle Keegan joked about suffering from sweaty shoes and feet in her latest Instagram snap.

The Mancunian actress, 32, lamented about the mishap in the post as she was pictured holding a pair of killer Perspex heels in her hand while sat in the back of a luxury car.

And it seemed the heat was too much for the former Coronation Street star.

The brunette beauty quipped: "For those thinking about buying Perspex shoes, do not take them off in a hot country, they will NOT be going back on... #nogive"

As usual, the Brassic star looked sensational and oozed glamour in a tight black strappy dress paired with sparkly diamond earrings.

Her celebrity friends complimented her looks on the photo, and even her mother-in-law chimed in.

(Image: Instagram)

Carol Wright posted: "My beautiful daughter in law."

She flashed a huge grin in the picture as her dark hair was tied back out of her face, while enjoying the super loved-up getaway with hubby Mark Wright .

The happy couple have finally found some time in their busy schedules for some romance as they jetted off on a luxury Dubai break.

(Image: Instagram)

Michelle and Mark have been sharing envy-inducing snaps from their sun-soaked trip and have showed off their glowing golden tans and swimsuit-perfect bodies.

And they have showed just how in love they are with funny videos of the pair having a laugh together.

Former Towie star Mark, 32, took to Instagram with a post as he challenged himself to the Avengers: Endgame viral video trend.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The smoothly created video presented Mark 'the Avenger' jumping out of the water and on to land ready for the ‘assemble’ scene.

Obviously, the reality star had jumped into the pool and then reversed the hilarious clip.

He captioned his Avengers impression: "Flying into Monday like a F***ing Superhero."

(Image: Instagram)

Mark's stunning actress wife Michelle instantly squashed her husband's hopes of impressing his followers as she exposed the reality behind the fun clip.

Fans found their husband and wife banter hilarious and instantly fled to Michelle's comment to reply about the encounter.

Other holiday snaps have shown Mark sipping on a chilled beer in lavish pool settings and Michelle chilling out on the sand in a pretty green-palm print bikini and sun hat.
description: Michelle couldn't bear the heat as she cracked a joke about suffering from sweaty feet in her high heels
